name: Bomb Threat
description:
Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50! The theme was "Delay the Inevitable"

Solve as many puzzles as you can before the bomb detonates! Each puzzle you solve extends the clock, but each puzzle you fail cuts your time even shorter.

Inspired by Keep talking and Nobody Explodes. I wanted to have more puzzles in the game but I ended up having a late start and didn't quite have time for everything I wanted. I wanted to hone my 3d skills a bit so it was a good learning experience!
